translation.en: Doc, how pleased are you with Tiger King's depiction of you?
This is not a documentary.
Not a documentary.
It's fake. It's a silly fake show.
An incredible wild ride of a fanticiful tale.

translation.ko: 순 거짓말로 자신을 왜곡했대요 "존 레인키 GW 동물원 전 매니저"

translation.en: [Doc] They hid the fact that this facility
translation.ko: 이곳이 대형 고양잇과의 특급 호텔이란 사실을 숨겼어요

translation.en: is the Ritz-Carlton of keeping big cats.
translation.ko: 이곳이 대형 고양잇과의 특급 호텔이란 사실을 숨겼어요 "바가반 앤틀 박사"

translation.en: No one's even close to the grandeur and beauty of this facility.
translation.ko: 우리 시설의 웅장함과 아름다움에 견줄 건 없어요

translation.en: [Joe Exotic] It's an illusion. He creates an illusion for people to believe.
translation.ko: 다 환상이에요, 박사는 사람들이 믿을 환상을 만들죠

translation.en: I haven't spoke to Doc since this came out but he's not happy about it.
translation.ko: 이게 공개된 후 연락한 적 없지만 박사는 불만이 많아요

translation.en: [Barbara Fisher] Doc is a very skilled con artist.
He thinks that he's smarter than the rest of the world
translation.ko: 자기가 세상에서 제일 똑똑한 줄 알고 "바버라 피셔 박사의 직원 (1999-2007)"

translation.en: and he designs his environment around him to confirm that.
translation.ko: "바버라 피셔 박사의 직원 (1999-2007)" 그걸 입증할 수 있는 주변 환경을 조성해요

translation.en: [Barbara] He creates his own truth always.
[Barbara] He doesn't live in a world where people challenge him.
translation.ko: 아무도 자기한테 안 따지는 세상에 살죠 "머틀 비치 사파리"

translation.en: He doesn't-- He's not used to that anymore.
The silly little girl Barbara Fisher, that bitch is on there talking, saying,
translation.ko: 바보 천치 바버라 피셔 그 꼴값이 잘도 떠들더군요

translation.en: "They forced me to get a boob job after a month." Like, are you mad?
translation.ko: 입사 한 달 뒤에 가슴 성형을 강요당했다는데 장난해요?

translation.en: She was obsessed with having boobs.
Those boobs didn't live here, she's living out there,
translation.ko: 그 가슴녀는 여기가 아니라 외부에 살았고

translation.en: test driving them on every Tom, Dick, and Harry she can find.
translation.ko: 그거로 이 남자, 저 남자 다 꼬셨어요

translation.en: -That's why she's pregnant all the time. -Oh, fuck.
In terms of what he said about me, it's pure misogyny, that's what it is.
translation.ko: 박사가 저에 대해 한 말은 순전히 여성 혐오 발언이에요

translation.en: [Barbara] Since Tiger King, we had people coming by the house, recognizing the dog.
translation.ko: '타이거 킹'이 방송된 후 사람들이 찾아오고 개를 알아봤죠

translation.en: Just the fact that everybody probably could figure out where I lived
translation.ko: 사람들이 마음만 먹으면 제 집을 찾아냈으니까

translation.en: and that means Doc knew where I lived.
That was scary to me, so we just went out into the deep country
translation.ko: 전 그게 무서워서 시골 벽지로 이사했고

translation.en: and that's where we remain.
[Barbara] Doc has gotten away with this for so long, he thinks he's bulletproof.
translation.ko: 박사는 하도 오래 처벌을 피해서 뭐든 해도 되는 줄 알아요

translation.en: But after Tiger King, all these people contacted me with their own stories.
translation.ko: 하지만 방송 후, 각자 사연을 가진 사람들이 연락해 왔어요

translation.en: I knew that if I came forward, other people would too.
translation.ko: 제가 나서면 다들 뒤따를 줄 알았어요

translation.en: [Barbara] There is safety in numbers.
[Barbara] Maybe he doesn't think that you'll look back into his past.
translation.ko: 박사는 우리가 자기 과거를 잊을 거로 생각하겠지만요

translation.en: But what's going on with Doc won't survive in sunlight.
[guide] Good morning! It's nice and warm today, isn't it?
-[crowd] Yeah! -[guide] Just a couple rules on it.

This is your final warning.

translation.ko: 동영상이나 사진을 찍으면 퇴장 조치 돼요

translation.en: I'm Dr. Bhagavan Antle, director here at Myrtle Beach Safari.
translation.ko: 머틀 비치 사파리의 바가반 앤틀 박사입니다

translation.en: Myrtle Beach Safari is an incredible wildlife encounter
translation.ko: 야생 동물과의 멋진 만남의 장소로 "바가반 앤틀 박사 머틀 비치 사파리 감독"

translation.en: where you get to have an up-close, interactive experience
translation.ko: 바로 가까이에서 서로 교감을 나눌 수 있어요

translation.en: with a variety of incredible exotic animals
up-close, uncaged and unbelievable interaction.
translation.ko: 자유로운 모습을 보며 상호 교감을 체험하죠

translation.en: A handful of people in the world get to have an eagle living in your house.
translation.ko: 집에서 독수리를 키우는 사람은 전 세계에서도 극소수예요 "로버트 존슨 박사의 동물원 조련사"

translation.en: Sitting on the glove watching Game of Thrones.
translation.ko: "로버트 존슨 박사의 동물원 조련사" 독수리를 팔에 올리고 같이 TV 보는

translation.en: That doesn't happen a whole lot for a lot of people.
When I was 12 years old, I got a photo taken in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina.
translation.ko: 12살 때 사우스캐롤라이나의 머틀 비치에서 찍은 사진이 있어요

translation.en: I looked at my mom and said, "This is what I want to do for the rest of my life."
translation.ko: 전 엄마한테 평생 이 일을 하고 싶다고 말했었죠 "주얼스 매켄지 박사의 직원 (2003-2011)"

translation.en: And when senior year came around, I called up Doc Antle and I said,
translation.ko: 그리고 졸업반이 됐을 때 앤틀 박사에게 전화해서

translation.en: "Please let me come volunteer for you,"
and he said, "Well, how soon can you move here?"
translation.ko: 얼마나 빨리 올 수 있느냐고 묻더군요

translation.en: And it was like I'd gotten the golden ticket for American Idol.
translation.ko: 인기 있는 가수 오디션 프로의 방청권이라도 받은 것처럼

translation.en: I'm like, "Ah! Okay."
[Jewels] I worked for Doc Antle for seven years.
My parents were actually really happy that I was doing something that I believed I wanted to do.
translation.ko: 부모님은 제가 원한다고 착각했던 일을 해서 좋아하셨죠

translation.en: I don't think they realized what I was really signing up for,
translation.ko: 제가 뭘 하게 된 건지 잘 모르셨어요

translation.en: which is just 24/7 working at a place that I can't really leave.
translation.ko: 일주일 내내 종일 일만 했고 사실상 떠날 수도 없었어요

translation.en: Barbara was the first person to come and talk to me.
translation.ko: 처음 말 걸어 준 사람이 바버라예요

translation.en: Me and Barb focused a lot on training little cubs to become walking adolescents.
translation.ko: 우린 새끼들이 걸어 다닐 만큼 클 때까지 훈련했어요

translation.en: We would go to this place called Barefoot Landing every day,
and we would do photos with tiger cubs and big cats.
translation.ko: 호랑이 새끼, 대형 고양잇과와 사진을 찍었죠

translation.en: [Shavit Perel] One summer, I went to call a friend of mine in Myrtle Beach,
translation.ko: 언젠가 여름에 머틀 비치의 친구에게 연락했는데

translation.en: and he offered me a job operating a climbing wall in Barefoot Landing.
translation.ko: '베어풋 랜딩'의 인공 암벽을 운영해 달라고 제안했어요 "줄리 & 샤빗 퍼럴 박사의 전 직원"

translation.en: [Shavit] As the summer went on, I started developing relationships
with the people that worked at Preservation Station.
It started with Barbara, and then it was China.
Everybody looked like Crocodile Dundee.
And everybody was tan and blond and had a knife
translation.ko: 모두 태닝한 금발이었고 칼을 갖고 있었는데

translation.en: and it was really impressive.
And then eventually Doc would show up.
He just blew me away.
By the time we reached the end of summer, he said, "How about you come work for me?"
translation.ko: 여름이 끝나갈 무렵 박사가 일자리를 제안했고

translation.en: I said, "I'm in."
I stayed at the barn where the elephant was living.
So I would go to sleep with Bubbles and I would wake up with Bubbles.
translation.ko: 버블스랑 같이 자고 버블스랑 같이 일어났죠

translation.en: Who the heck am I to be lucky enough to be in this position?
translation.ko: 내가 뭐라고 이런 행운을 거머쥐었나 했어요

translation.en: And then they would give me those clothes, and I got my knife.
translation.ko: 그리고 그들이 입는 옷과 칼도 받았어요

translation.en: Now I'm looking like Crocodile Dundee, right?
I'm the cool guy.
And it got to the point, like, I'm living a dream.
But everything completely turned on its head once Julie came into the picture.
translation.ko: 하지만 줄리가 온 후 모든 게 완전히 역전됐어요

translation.en: I'm talking to Doc and he goes,
translation.ko: "줄리 퍼렐 박사의 직원 (2001)" 박사랑 얘기 중이었는데 그가 새 여직원들 얘기를 꺼내면서

translation.en: "I just want to let you know, there's a couple of new girls."
translation.ko: 박사랑 얘기 중이었는데 그가 새 여직원들 얘기를 꺼내면서

translation.en: "I don't want you getting involved."
Somebody told me, "Hey, Doc rated you a nine."
Part of me was like, "Oh, yeah," and then part of me is like, "What?"
translation.ko: 한편으로는 기분 좋았지만 한편으로는 기분이 묘했죠

translation.en: [Magenta Brooks] Women and men at Doc's compound were treated very differently.
translation.ko: 박사의 시설에서 여자와 남자의 대우는 천지 차이였어요

translation.en: He definitely showed off his giant bed a few more times than was necessary
translation.ko: 박사는 대형 침대를 직원들에게 몇 번이나 자랑했죠 "머젠타 브룩스 박사의 직원 (1997-1999)"

translation.en: to do with an employee.
I had always wondered if I had misread things,
and then seeing Tiger King and hearing Barbara talk, it was so cathartic.
translation.ko: '타이거 킹'을 보고 바버라 말을 들으니 속이 시원했죠

translation.en: It was just this amazing confirmation that I didn't make this up,
translation.ko: 제가 지어낸 게 아니라는 확인이 됐잖아요

translation.en: and other people saw it too. [sighs]
[Magenta] I am a polyamory relationship coach
and I've been noticing that people keep talking about Doc as being polyamorous.
translation.ko: 사람들은 박사가 다자 연애자라고 말해 왔어요

translation.en: Polyamory requires respect that flows both ways.
It requires autonomy.
And Doc is not encouraging his partners
to create healthy relationships outside of him.
translation.ko: 자기 말고 다른 사람을 만나면 싫어해요

translation.en: -It's a harem, it's not polyamory. -[cryptic music plays]
[Doc] I have my three beloved partners who've been with me for 20 years each.
translation.ko: 전 20년씩 함께한 사랑하는 세 파트너가 있어요

translation.en: My son, my three daughters.
And that group of people, along with the peripheral characters around them,
translation.ko: 이 가족을 중심으로 그들의 주변 인물들은 모두

translation.en: love doing this and plan on to continue to do it.
So if I move to the Himalayan Mountains today,
those guys should be able to step up and run some facsimile of it.
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 나서서 운영해 나갈 거예요

translation.en: [Magenta] He's got this very highly overinflated sense of self. He sees himself as kind of a guru.
translation.ko: 박사는 자신을 너무 부풀려서 영적 지도자인 구루인 줄 알아요

translation.en: And so, having followers or having animals that are subservient to him
kind of bolsters that narrative.
[Barbara] After we all changed our names, he gave a bunch of us different chains.
translation.ko: 우리가 이름을 바꾼 직후 박사가 각각 다른 체인을 줬어요

translation.en: The medallion signified to all of us
this union of us all being one family.
It's a symbol for the integral yoga that Swami Satchidananda purported.
translation.ko: 이건 스와미 사치다난다가 주창한 통합 요가의 상징이죠

translation.en: He was the guru that opened Woodstock.
A picture of the big bearded guy going, "Let's start." That's Swami Satchidananda.
translation.ko: '시작'을 말하는 사진 속의 털보가 스와미 사치다난다죠

translation.en: [Doc] Tons of famous people are longtime devotees.
translation.ko: 세계의 수많은 유명인이 오랫동안 그를 따랐어요

translation.en: [Barbara] He met Swamiji Satchidananda in Yogaville.
translation.ko: 박사는 요가빌에서 스와미 사치다난다를 만났죠 "요가빌 비드야라얌 로터스, 1986년"

translation.en: [Barbara] All these people devoted to Swamiji and listening to everything he says,
translation.ko: 많은 사람이 스와미에게 헌신했고 그의 모든 얘기에 귀 기울이며

translation.en: and basing every aspect of their life around him.
[Barbara] If there's somebody he idolized, it's Swamiji.
translation.ko: "스와미 사치다난다와 바가반 앤틀 박사" 박사가 우상시하는 사람이 스와미예요

translation.en: The way he talks about him, it's beyond hero worship.
translation.ko: 말하는 걸 들어 보면 숭배하는 정도가 아니죠

translation.en: [man] How did you go from Yogaville to being a--
[Doc] Once you add Yogaville,
you're dropping in this incredibly complicated,
cult-ridden, strange entity, like, "What?"
translation.ko: 완전 사이비인 이상한 곳이란 느낌을 주잖아요

translation.en: [female voice] The Reverend Sri Swami Satchidananda
experienced the spiritual oneness of all creation
and dreamed of creating a shrine where that oneness could be seen and felt.
translation.ko: 그 일체감을 보고 느낄 수 있는 신전을 만들고자 했습니다

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda used to always laughingly say
translation.ko: 스와미 사치다난다는 항상 웃으면서 말했어요 "조앤 시촌 전 요가빌 신도"

translation.en: that the yoga institutes were asylums and we were all the inmates.
And people would go, "Ha-ha-ha. That's so funny, Swamiji."
But it was true. -We were having crisis times. -[tense music plays]
People were choosing between yoga and Scientology, and I thought,
"I wasn't raised by wolves. I am going to go with yoga."
translation.ko: 전 사회 부적응자가 아니니 요가를 택하기로 했어요

translation.en: [Satchidananda] Everywhere there seems to be the cry.
We hear people shouting in the name of peace,
but they want to fight for peace.
Most of the people at Yogaville are loving, caring individuals,
who want to better themselves spiritually and want to better the world.
translation.ko: 영적으로 성숙해지고 더 나은 세상을 만들길 원했죠

translation.en: [female voice] Yogaville is an intentional community where people choose to live together
translation.ko: 요가빌은 계획 공동체로 사람들이 함께 모여 살며

translation.en: practicing yoga, vegetarian diet, meditation.
translation.ko: 요가와 채식, 명상을 생활화했어요 "수마티 스타인버그 전 요가빌 신도"

translation.en: There's probably close to 250 permanent residents.
My parents met Swami Satchidananda when I was five years old,
translation.ko: 부모님은 제가 5살 때 스와미 사치다난다를 만났고

translation.en: and I started meditating myself when I was 11, by choice.
I was doing, I don't know, four to six hours a day of yoga and meditation, yeah.
We were a very peaceful, loving, accepting…
translation.ko: 우리는 평화롭고 정이 넘치며 수용적인 공동체였어요

translation.en: Hari om, hari om, hari om.
[female voice] People believe Swami Satchidananda is a god.
-A Jesus Christ. He can do no wrong. -[gentle music plays]
They would drop to the ground when he walked into the room
translation.ko: 그가 방에 들어오면 바닥에 엎드려 "사치 오바 전 요가빌 신도"

translation.en: and bow to his feet. Kiss his feet.
[Sachi] I watched Tiger King, and I was like, "Damn." "They don't even know the story before that."
translation.ko: '타이거 킹'을 봤는데 그 전의 사연은 전혀 모르더군요

translation.en: Doc Antle got ideas from Swami Satchidananda.
He was attracted to the power that he wielded over other people.
translation.ko: 다른 사람들을 지배하는 그 힘에 끌렸죠

translation.en: Bhagavan was a very well-known character at Yogaville.
translation.ko: "바가반 앤틀 박사 타이거스 설립자 & 감독" 바가반은 요가빌에서도 아주 유명한 사람이었어요

translation.en: Swami Satchidananda loved him. He was, you know, lots of flash.
translation.ko: 스와미 사치다난다도 아꼈고 언론에 많이 포착됐죠

translation.en: He had Bubbles, the little baby elephant.
He was like a celebrity there.
[female announcer] Bhagavan Antle of Bhagavan's Celestial Magic.
[Joan] He was the cute boy of the '80s. He had long dark hair, a mustache.
translation.ko: 1980년대의 바가반은 미남으로 짙은 장발에 콧수염이 있었죠

translation.en: He was a magic man.
[Steven Diamond] The two of us had an instant connection through magic.
translation.ko: 우리 둘은 마법으로 바로 죽이 맞았어요

translation.en: I was about 15 or 16.
I had my own career at that time, so I was doing fairs and festivals.
translation.ko: 전 그때도 활동했기 때문에 박람회나 축제에 다녔죠 "스티븐 다이아몬드 박사의 마법 파트너"

translation.en: And I was very popular all up and down the East Coast.
Bhagavan saw me as a great way to make some money.
translation.ko: "전문 마술사인 지역 학생" 바가반은 저를 좋은 돈벌이로 생각했어요

translation.en: [Steven] And so, right away we kind of formed this little informal partnership.
translation.ko: 그래서 우린 바로 비공식적인 동업자가 됐고

translation.en: A 50/50 plan was the deal.
[Steven] Come down, guys! Run!
[Steven] He had this place called The Buckingham Zoological Park.
translation.ko: 그는 당시 버킹엄 동물원을 소유하고 있었는데

translation.en: Right outside of Yogaville.
You'd drive down this little country road and you wouldn't know that it was there
translation.ko: 차로 이 길을 지나가도 알아보기 힘든 곳이었어요

translation.en: unless you knew exactly how to find it.
You walked through the little gate and you see this A-frame house.
translation.ko: 작은 문을 지나면 삼각형 집이 보여요

translation.en: It kind of looked like something a hobbit might live in.
And immediately, as soon as you walked in, you could see an elephant in the distance,
and you could see tigers back there, you could see lions.
Good boy.
[Steven] In the beginning, it was such a great place.
What I liked about the Buckingham Zoo was the community that Bhagavan had built.
translation.ko: 버킹엄 동물원에서 바가반이 구축한 공동체가 좋았어요

translation.en: [man] I met Bhagavan right out of high school.
